definitions.definition: A block or slab upon which a column , pedestal , statue or other structure is based.
examples: The queen placed the vase on the plinth so the cupbearer could fill it with flowers.

definitions.definition: The bottom course of a wall.
A base or pedestal beneath a cabinet .

main_definition: A block or slab upon which a column , pedestal , statue or other structure is based.
secondary_definitions: The bottom course of a wall.
A base or pedestal beneath a cabinet .
